hero.title: Life with Dignity,
hero.description: Federally certified hospice care provider serving Southern California with bilingual English/Traditional Chinese services. Medicare, Medi-Cal, and HMO coverage up to 100%.

services.title: Comprehensive Hospice
services.description: Our Chinese-speaking medical professionals provide personalized care arrangements for patients and families, including home care, inpatient care, continuous care, and respite care services.

homecare.title: Home Care
homecare.description: Routine visits, intermittent and on-demand care provided in the comfort of your home.

inpatient.title: Inpatient Care
inpatient.description: Professional facility care arrangements when specialized nursing is needed.

continuous.title: Continuous Care
continuous.description: Shift-based nursing care to help patients through difficult periods.

respite.title: Respite Care
respite.description: Up to 5 days of relief care for families and primary caregivers in professional facilities.

about.title: Federally Certified
about.description: IE Community Hospice Inc. is a federally certified Medicare/Medi-Cal hospice care provider serving 5 counties in Southern California. Our mission: providing compassionate care that enhances quality of life with dignity, comfort, and hope.

items.name: Mrs. Wang
items.content: The Chinese-speaking staff made all the difference. They understood our cultural needs and provided care with genuine compassion and respect.

items.name: Chen Family
items.content: Available 24/7 when we needed them most. The pain management and emotional support helped our father maintain his dignity throughout his journey.

items.name: Rodriguez Family
items.content: Medicare covered everything. We didn't have to worry about costs and could focus on spending quality time together during those precious final months.

contact.title: We're Here to Help
contact.description: Don't worry about insurance - call 909-321-2255. We have insurance specialists ready to answer all your questions and concerns.

form.title: Send us a message
form.messagePlaceholder: How can we help you and your family?

phone.title: 24/7 Support Line
phone.note: Nurse on-call available outside business hours

emergency.title: 24/7 Emergency Support
emergency.description: For medical emergencies, call 911. For urgent hospice care needs:

footer.description: IE Community Hospice Inc. - Federally certified Medicare/Medi-Cal hospice care provider serving Southern California with bilingual services and culturally sensitive care.
